name: refight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fight something such as a war or election again: The action figures let you re-fight the war and change the ending. We do not want to refight the ideological battles of the past.
More examplesFewer examplesEvery generation must re-fight the battles for freedom in the light of its own experience.As boys, my brother and I refought many an imagined battle in the garden.She intends to remain in the constituency and submit her name for selection to re-fight the seat.I don't know why we refight the same fights over and over.
